name: Epsilon 9: The Revenge of The Stingons
overview: Yeno Hou returns in Epsilon 9: The Revenge of the Stingons, a sci-fi point & click graphic adventure and the sequel to Starbase 13. The game opens with Yeno Hou reporting to Galactic Forces headquarters immediately after the events of the previous game. He is told they already need him to deal with another urgent situation: a vital mining operation on a distant planet (Epsilon 9) has stopped responding to communications. Yeno Hou immediately takes off in a ship, and the game begins as he arrives at the mining facility's deserted front desk.
